bdi4jade.core

Class MultipleCapabilityAgent

  • java.lang.Object
    • jade.core.Agent
      • bdi4jade.core.AbstractBDIAgent
        • bdi4jade.core.MultipleCapabilityAgent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BDIAgent, jade.core.TimerListener, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable

    public class MultipleCapabilityAgent
extends AbstractBDIAgent
    This class is a BDIAgent that has multiple aggregated capabilities.
    Author:
    Ingrid Nunes
